CustomField.description: First day of the week, every week, the process that creates shifts will run on this day. (0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday, 2 = Tuesday, etc) (PVFSL-132)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First day of the week, every week, the process that creates shifts will run on this day. (0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday, 2 = Tuesday, etc)
CustomField.label: Shifts First Day of the Week
